roleset.name: (cause to) petrify, make rigid
roleset.note: FOSSILIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fossilize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, comparison with 'ossify.' (from fossilize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: No Agent
example.text: The fossil history of snakes is very poorly known, since [snake skeletons]-1 are very delicate and *-1 do not fossilize easily.

example.name: Metaphorical, with attribute
example.text: It-1 must not remain fossilized *-1 in the form codified by Daniel Jones almost a century ago.
example.arg: in the form codified by Daniel Jones almost a century ago
